Battle Cards

LV Gamma-Disruptor Launcher

  1. LV Gamma-Disruptor Launcher states that up to 2 of them can fit in one Weapon Slot. If I were to play a 3rd one, would it replace the 2 already in the Weapon Slot or would it only replace 1 of them?
    It would only replace one of the previously equipped two.
